name: Spartry'n'die
description:
How to play:

Move with the left/right arrow. You can double jump by pressing the up arrow key 2 times. You can go through platform with down arrow.

The objective of the game is to finish every level the fastest and with the fewest death you can.

Credits:

Game Design MOOC, 85T

Tips :

Every 5 levels, there is tricky bonus level. Pay attention.

The enemy always walk in your direction.

-> There are only 12 levels, will you reach the end
